content:
2.6 Eligibility for Validation Activities

AKES conducted the verification activity; the validation was performed by the other VWWB. 4KES has a valid UNFCCC accreditation in the sectoral scope from UNFCCC. The accreditation scope can be checked from the below link: http://cdm.unfccc.int/DOE/list/DOE.html?entityCode=E- 0069

VALIDATION FINDINGS

3.4 Participation under Other GHG Programs

The project has been simultaneously registered as a CDM Project activity under the UNFCCC (Project 10326)1; however it will either claim emission reduction under the VCS program or under the CDM, never both. For this monitoring period, PP is claiming only under VCS which is also verified from the declaration given by the PP /11/.
